name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior AI Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in building AI-driven UIs and SaaS integrations. Proficient in **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, **Python**, and developing robust **REST APIs**. Experienced in leveraging **LangChain** and **Vercel AI SDK** to create innovative solutions. Demonstrated ability in collaboration across interdisciplinary teams to enhance productivity and delivery.
Skilled in both frontend and backend technologies including **React**, with a solid background in deploying microservices architectures and integrating with **MCP servers**. Strong understanding of compliance-driven development within the healthcare and financial sectors, ensuring adherence to standards like HIPAA, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Proficient in creating AI/ML-powered platforms that facilitate predictive analytics and real-time data processing, with hands-on experience in MLOps including model training and orchestration using tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
